        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1853</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The History of Zionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geschichte von Zionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire du sionisme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O history do zionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia di zionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορία zionism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La historia del sionismo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Power point presentation on the History of Zionism with the emphasis on Ethnicity, Nationalism and the origins of Zionism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nationalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ethnicity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Energie Punktdarstellung auf der Geschichte 
von Zionism mit dem Hauptgewicht auf Ethnicity, Nationalismus und den 
Ursprung von Zionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation de point de puissance sur 
l'histoire du sionisme avec l'emphase sur l'appartenance ethnique, le 
nationalisme et les origines du sionisme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação do ponto da potência no 
history do zionism com a ênfase na etnicidade, no nationalism e nas 
origens do zionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione del punto di potenza sulla 
storia di zionism con l'enfasi su origine etnica, su nazionalismo e 
sulle origini di zionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια παρουσίαση Power Point για την ιστορία 
zionism με την έμφαση στο έθνος, τον εθνικισμό και την 
προέλευση zionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación de la punta de la potencia en 
la historia del sionismo con el énfasis en pertenencia étnica, 
nacionalismo y los orígenes del sionismo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
